attributes.action: urge all  train operators to provide carriages specifically for push chairs and prams during rush hour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many working people making their commute home on trains during rush hour are resentful because they have to stand cramped and squashed because of the number of pushchairs, which take up enough space to stand several people.
Train operators should provide carriages specifically for these pushchairs so that the working public can have a decent ride home. If this is not possible, it should become COMPULSORY for these parents to fold up the pushchairs to make more room.
